question: What is allowed after Nikah?
answer:
QUESTION
My question is in regard to Nikah. In a year the Nikah is to take place but marriage won't take place for a few years afterward. Both will finish their education. I was wondering what is and what is not allowed after the actual Nikah in Islam (though both will be separate for some period of time)?????
ANSWER


Share:
According to the Shari'ah, once a Nikah (Islamic marriage contract) takes
place, both husband and wife may communicate with one another freely. There
is no restrictions after the Nikah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
